description: Teach Me To Take It: Bob drops by Jeff's house for a balling session they had arranged a few days earlier. Though they had been together before, Bob would never let Jeff take him anally. Jeff had wanted to get between Bob's buns before but Bob had always said ?No, he couldn't.? Today, Bob got so hard he begged Jeff to teach him to take it; and he did! If heavy rimming and penetration by a heavy tool into a pair of beautiful round buns turns you on, this film is a must for your collection.
title: Teach Me, Scene #03
